clinical_study.brief_title: Trends Over Time (1990-2010) of Diarrhoea-related Incidence, Hospitalizations and Deaths in Children of Panama
clinical_study.official_title: Time Trend Analysis of Diarrhoea-related Incidence, Hospitalizations, and Deaths in Children < 5 Years of Age in Panama by Monitoring Secondary Data Sources From 1990-2010

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims at collecting data from secondary sources to obtain baseline incidence and monitor trends over time (1990 - 2010) of reported gastroenteritis cases, gastroenteritis related hospital discharges and gastroenteritis related deaths in children < 5 years of age in Panama before and after implementation of Rotarix™ universal mass vaccination.

detailed_description.textblock: Data will be collected from systematic review of the databases of epidemiologic surveillance system, hospital discharges and deaths for all cause gastroenteritis related outcomes.

primary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of all cause reported gastroenteritis
primary_outcome.time_frame: In post vaccine introduction period (2006-2010) compared to pre-vaccination period (1990-2005)

primary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of all cause gastroenteritis related hospital discharges
primary_outcome.time_frame: In post vaccine introduction period (2006-2010) compared to pre-vaccination period (2000-2005)

primary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of all cause gastroenteritis related deaths.
primary_outcome.time_frame: In post vaccine introduction period (2006-2010) compared to pre-vaccination period (1990-2005)

secondary_outcome.measure: Occurrence of all cause gastroenteritis-related cases by year, age groups and region
Occurrence of all cause gastroenteritis related hospital discharge by year, age groups, hospital and setting
Occurrence of all cause gastroenteritis related deaths by year, age groups and region

intervention.intervention_name: Epidemiologic Surveillance System of the Ministry of Health of Panama
intervention.description: Reviewing the Epidemiologic Surveillance System of the Ministry of Health of Panama

intervention.intervention_name: Mortality database of the Contraloria General de la Republica
intervention.description: Reviewing the Mortality database of the Contraloria General de la Republica

study_pop.textblock: All children <5 years of age reported with gastroenteritis, gastroenteritis related hospital discharges and gastroenteritis related deaths in Panama, between 1990 and 2010.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diarrhea cases, diarrhea associated hospital discharges, and diarrhea related deaths occurring in children <5 years of age during the period analyzed and registered in the Epidemiologic Surveillance System of the Ministry of Health, in the mortality database of the Contraloría General de la República and in the hospital discharge records of the selected hospitals, will be collected for the study.
